word:
As the dwellers in Eden learned from nature's pages, as Moses discerned God's handwriting on the Arabian plains and mountains, and the Child Jesus on the hillsides of Nazareth, so the children of today may learn of Him. The unseen is illustrated by the seen. On everything upon the earth . . . from the boundless ocean to the tiniest shell on the shore, they may behold the image and superscription of God (Ibid., pp. 99, 100). 
                                                                           69
